title: 18th Amendment will leave Public Servants at President’s mercy – Ranil
content: The Island – by Zacki Jabbar Instead of implementing the 17th Amendment that would have given public servants the badly needed protection they require, public servants are tied to trees and abused by members of the Mahinda Rajapaksa government, Opposition leader Ranil Wickremesinghe said yesterday. Addressing a group of public servants in Colombo, he said…
